description: Bookmarklet - use this bookmarklet for Bookmarklet - use this bookmarklet for adding note box to YouTube video and take notes on it. Just start typing. Press ''Ctrl+m'' to add time mark. Press ''Alt+a'' to copy contents of note box. Ensure to copy/paste the top condensed line of the bookmarklet. Info at https://github.com/isocialPractice/bookmarklets.. Ensure to copy/paste the top condensed line of the bookmarklet. Info at "https://github.com/isocialPractice/bookmarklets".

Use Windows OS to call Linux tldr command. IMPORTANT - must have Windows Subsystem for Linux -WSL- installed with ''tldr'' package install on it. NOTE - Works best if ''tldr'' was installed using Pythons's pip3 package manager.
Bash script to traverse through a directory, recursing with a call to a function that finds and replaces specific text.

Check if the date passed is Thanksgiving. Use format YYYY-MM-DD for parameter e.g. 2023-11-23. Tested results of test_thanksgiving.sh against table from https://gist.github.com/dantonnoriega/3fc513495733f71c8820b0c885bf4406. See test_check_if_thanksgiving.sh for more details.

Bookmarklet - use this bookmarklet for to click anywhere on a webpage with a customized page down value. Good for reading certain pages. Ensure to copy/paste the top condensed line of the bookmarklet. Info at "https://github.com/isocialPractice/bookmarklets".

Bookmarklet - use this bookmarklet for changing or adding a websites' favicon. Ensure to copy/paste the top condensed line of the bookmarklet. Info at "https://github.com/isocialPractice/bookmarklets".
Function to number ol items and their nested ol items.
NodeJS Gist - Check if a json file has a certain property and output pass or fail to terminal

Bookmarklet - use this bookmarklet for bookmarking a specific StackOverflow answer. It adds a button that when clicked adds the answers id to the address bar as if clicking an anchor link. This makes it easy to bookmark a specific answer. Ensure to copy/paste the top condensed line of the bookmarklet. Info at "https://github.com/isocialPractice/bookmarklets".

Bookmarklet - use this bookmarklet for copying a ready bookmarklet to the clipboard. Once run all copied answers will be copied and ready to paste as new bookmarklet. Ensure to copy/paste the top condensed line of the bookmarklet. Info at "https://github.com/isocialPractice/bookmarklets".

Bookmarklet - use this bookmarklet for the 3d printer browser application OctoPrint. Change or remove the main image OctoPrint. If uses as is then image is removed. IMPORTANT NOTE - this has only been tested via Raspberry Pi OS - a Unix-like OS; and not OctoPi OS. Ensure to copy/paste the top condensed line of the bookmarklet. Info at "https://github.com/isocialPractice/bookmarklets".
Change raw text with patterns or sequential HTML tags to an HTML table.

Bookmarklet - use this bookmarklet for GitHub repo pages to alternate the row colors of repo directory. Activate in repo root and file viewing. Ensure to copy/paste the top condensed line of the bookmarklet. Info at "https://github.com/isocialPractice/bookmarklets".
NodeJS Gist - Extract one nested value and one unnested value in an array of json objects.

Bookmarklet - use this bookmarklet to When viewing files in repo add a column showing file size. Loosely based on https://stackoverflow.com/questions/38675428/list-file-sizes-in-github#answer-75526865. Ensure to copy/paste the top condensed line of the bookmarklet. Info at "https://github.com/isocialPractice/bookmarklets".

Bookmarklet - use this bookmarklet to underline the current pages' anchor link and clicked anchor links. Ensure to copy/paste the top condensed line of the bookmarklet. Info at "https://github.com/isocialPractice/bookmarklets".
Bookmarklet - use this bookmarklet for specific ChatGPT page. Resize the ChatGPT text prompt. Info at "https://github.com/isocialPractice/bookmarklets".

Bookmarklet - use this bookmarklet for specific ChatGPT page. Bookmark response as basic text or HTML. Change variable textOut to 1 for text and 0 for HTML. Ensure to copy/paste the top condensed line of the bookmarklet. Info at "https://github.com/isocialPractice/bookmarklets".

Bookmarklet - use this bookmarklet for pages that have a side navigation with many links, but do not highlight the link text of the current page. Ensure to copy/paste the top condensed line of the bookmarklet. Info at "https://github.com/isocialPractice/bookmarklets".

Change html meta tag content value for meta tags with the attributes: name="keywords" and/or name="description". See instructions at top of document, but ensure to replace the Contents of the json variable "MetadataForMetaSEOTags" with your data. Adjust elements to fit site structure.
